title: DIH add data and after a while removes all from index
description:
Hi guys,

I am having weird problem. I am currently using solr 1.5-dev. Wanted to switch to 4.0. Have dropped my indexes as they are not backward compatible and have run DIH. All data have been indexed and were even searchable for a short while, after that all have been suddenly dropped.

All is working fine on 1.5 so it force me to thinking that it must be some kind of bug in 4.0

P.S.
Sorry for posting twice but couldn't see it under solr 4.0 section

cheers,
/Marcin

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Marcin: I realize you opened this issue quite a while ago, and i'm sorry it sliped through the cracks.

There's not enough information here to make a guess as to what problem you might have been having when you tried this – hopefully you've already figured out a solution to your problem but if not please post more details (including your configs and logs) to the solr-user@lucene mailing list.
